name: Mobile Responsive Sidebar
author: 3X Web

sections.description:
Transform your wordpress sidebar in a mobile responsibe sidebar, mobile users can access your sidebar widgets on the go just clicking the sidebar button.

Your sidebars will slide onscreen, works great with woocommerce filters!

This mobile friendly plugin will bring next level usability to your wordpress website.

How it Works

  • install
  • sidebars are now hidden by default on small screens only
  • mobile users can now see a round button on the bottom of the scree to open/close sidebars

Features

  • Responsive sidebar open/close button;
  • Elementor Compatible;
  • Works with any theme;
  • Great for woocommerce filters;
  • Lightweight, this plugins uses only wordpress core scripts;
sections.installation:
Plugins Directory

  1. Install Mobile Responsive Sidebar
  2. Activate Mobile Responsive Sidebar from Plugins page

Direct Dowload

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Mobile Responsive Sidebar from Plugins page
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Release Date: Jul 09, 2020
Update: Added compatibility with elementor
Update: Better Layout positioning for sidebars

1.0

Release Date: May 13, 2020
This is the first release.

short_description: Convert any sidebar into a responsive, icon-activated sidebar for mobile users, works with any sidebar, works with woocommerce filters on sidebar.
